item.title: Wordpress - Automatically publish a pending post each weekday morning from a PHP script
item.description: In an earlier post, Piwik Web Analytics, and some unfortunate stats about my blog, I mentioned that the Feedburner stats for this blog show a relatively high subscribe/unsubscribe rate for this blog. I think a large part of that is my tendency to blog in spurts, and even worse …
item.dc:creator: admin
